channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Catalyst Connect Zoho CRM Client Portal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Catalyst Connect Zoho CRM Client Portal

item.title: CVE-2023-0588|2024-08-02T05:17:49.898Z -- unknown -- catalyst%20connect%20zoho%20crm%20client%20portal
item.description: The Catalyst Connect Zoho CRM Client Portal WordPress plugin before 2.1.0 does not sanitize and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high-privilege users such as admin.
